movie.title: The President's Man: A Line in the Sand
movie.title_english: The President's Man: A Line in the Sand
movie.title_long: The President's Man: A Line in the Sand (2002)
movie.description_intro: A counterterrorism specialist is assigned by the President to track down a terrorist who is suspected of planning to set off a nuclear device in the U.S.
movie.description_full: A counterterrorism specialist is assigned by the President to track down a terrorist who is suspected of planning to set off a nuclear device in the U.S.

movies.title: Humanoids from the Deep
movies.summary: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.
movies.description_full: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.
movies.synopsis: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

movies.title: Another Man's Wife
movies.summary: Brian Warner takes his workaholic wife Hadley and their teenage brat daughter Skylar to a mountain lodge to mend their bond after a marital separation. The owner, Al Paunovic, seduces Hadley and stirs until Brian admits his one-nightstand, by Al is gruesomely obsessed with what seemed just a car accident she caused.

movies.title: Confessions of a Police Captain
movies.summary: One of the first films about the mafia occurrence, in which the fight is hopeless, because "the polyp's feeler" reaches everything and everybody. A police inspector and a deputy public prosecutor try to prove that the architect in the city is in the mafia.

movies.title: The Outpost
movies.summary: During the Afghanistan war, several outposts were placed to control the Taliban movement and their supply chain. Camp Keating, situated in a valley surrounded by mountains, was one them. While being shot at by the Talibans was business as usual, they tried to gain respect from local village elders and have them help stop these skirmishes. One day, when 400 Talibans rallied for a surprise attack, it was up to them to leverage the poor defenses and lack of ammo and manpower they had, to ultimately survive and go back to their loved ones.
